flavor_text_entries.black:
It has been said that they swallow those
who get too close and turn them into
mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.
flavor_text_entries.white:
They pretend to be elaborate coffins
to teach lessons to grave robbers.
Their bodies are covered in pure gold.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
Grave robbers who mistake them
for real coffins and get too close
end up trapped inside their bodies.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
Grave robbers who mistake them
for real coffins and get too close
end up trapped inside their bodies.

flavor_text_entries.sword:
This Pokémon has a body of sparkling gold.
People say it no longer remembers that it was
once human.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
There are many depictions of Cofagrigus
decorating ancient tombs. They’re symbols
of the wealth that kings of bygone eras had.
